question: What was the best paper at TACL 2014 ?
query: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(DISTINCT t3.citingpaperid), t1.paperid FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t3 ON t1.paperid = t3.citedpaperid JOIN venue AS t2 ON t2.venueid = t1.venueid WHERE t1.year = 2014 AND t2.venuename = 'TACL' GROUP BY t1.paperid ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT t3.citingpaperid) DESC NULLS LAST
